name: Critical Thinking
description: Strong ability to analyze situations objectively and make rational judgments

name: Systems Thinking
description: Approach to understanding how different parts of a system interact and affect each other

name: Lateral Problem Solving
description: Creative approach to finding solutions by looking at problems from different angles

name: Technical Adaptability
description: Ability to quickly adapt to new technologies and technical environments

name: Structured Debugging
description: Methodical approach to identifying and resolving technical issues
